enrolled-dateline.#text: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen

congress.#text: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America

official-title.#text: Making an emergency supplemental appropriation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, to provide funding to Israel for the Iron Dome defense system to counter short-range rocket threats.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: as an emergency requirement pursuant to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 251(b)(2)(A)(i) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251/ss:b/p:2/sp:A/cl:i

proviso.#tail: , That such funds shall be transferred immediately only through an exchange of letters to address emergent operations in support of Operation Protective Edge, notwithstanding section 3.1.3.2.1 of the U.S.-Israel Iron Dome Procurement Agreement:
, That nothing in this paragraph shall be construed to apply to previously appropriated funds for the procurement of Iron Dome:
, That such amount is designated by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to provide to the Government of Israel for the procurement of the Iron Dome defense system to counter short-range rocket threats

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}fund.#tail: , to remain available until September 30, 2015, which shall be

text.#text: the following sum is appropriated, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes, namely:
This joint resolution may be cited as the

role.#text: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: HJ 76 ENR: Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Resolution, 2014
